item.title: Anthropic’s fastest model, Claude 3.5 Haiku, now generally available

item.title: OpenAI rolls out ChatGPT for iPhone in landmark AI integration with Apple

item.title: Midjourney is launching a multiplayer collaborative worldbuilding tool called ‘Patchwork’
item.description: The news comes as other AI researchers and big tech companies seek to develop AI that can create 3D immersive, navigable worlds.
